subject: writing MultiThreaded test cases using Junit
msgSnippet: Hi! I need to write a test case where I need to spun off different threads to test one of my classes to test the thread safety of that class.  I was wondering
messageBody:
Hi!
I need to write a test case where I need to spun off different
threads to test one of my classes to test the thread safety of that
class. I was wondering how do I do that using junit.

I would appreciate your feedback...

thanks
Srini
